about_the_game:
This is a collection of pop and light monster graphics data if you think that realistic taste graphics does not fit your work atmosphere.

In addition to monster materials, this collection also includes face graphics that match the walking graphics of RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ.

*******************************************
Material files
Face: 12 sheets, 88 items (44 items for RPG Maker MV, 44 items for RPG Maker MZ)
Enemy: 172 items (92 items for MV/MZ common use, 40 items for RPG Maker MV, 40 items for RPG Maker MZ)
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
